summary:
Passionate about tax law with a proven track record in international transfer pricing, tax planning and corporate restructuring acquired through 12-year professional experience of both consulting firms (Baker McKenzie, Ernst & Young, KPMG) as well as private companies (Commerzbank, Philips, ICL Group) working across various industries e.g. banking, manufacturing, distribution, start-ups, real-estates, renewables, mining. Strong legal and financial education with a Master of Laws (LL.M.) at the University of Warsaw and a doctoral thesis (in progress) on transfer pricing aspects of buisness restructuring in cooperation with the University of Vienna (Scholarship: Ernst Mach Grant Worldwide 2011/2012). I now more particularly aspire to define and direct group tax planning including analysis regarding tax implication of major strategic initiatives (new distribution channels, change of legal structure, business expansion, or new production facilities) both on a regional and international level. 

•	Transfer Pricing in all aspects – transfer pricing modelling for cross border transactions, expertise for gathering financial information, knowledge of SAP ERP systems, preparation of local files under local law requirements and professional opinions of transfer pricing topics (BEPS, ATAD,OECD).
•	Tax Planning (Regional and International Level) – tax advice, reorganisations, restructuring (such as IP migrations, changes in supply chain, headquarter relocations), exit strategies, impact tax assessment of the implemented changes.
•	Corporate Income Tax, VAT, DTT – implementation of internal controls in place, ad-hoc advice regarding local and international tax issues, preparation of professional opinions including CIT, VAT and DTT analysis.
•	DAC6 /ATAD – unique experience in the implementation of the new EU Directive on the cross-border level and analysis the relevant events as potential tax reporting schemes.
•	Project Management - in-house tax functions, coordinate outside firms, tax projects, support with digital transformation and related technology solutions.
•	Tax Compliance - develop and provide direction on tax policies and processes to help foster a strong control and governance environment within the tax function.

Specialties: transfer pricing, international tax, income tax, tax advisory, corporate law, business valuation standards, corporate governance, mergers & acquisitions, tax & legal research, legal opinions, tax compliance.

Director of the Centre of Fiscal Studies, Nicolaus Copernicus University and
Member of the Executive Board, IFA Poland

profile_positions.description:
Role: As a member of the European Tax Team and reporting to European Tax Director; I am responsible for overseeing transfer pricing control for all activities in EMEA countries. My responsibility consists of review, prepare local files and support group entities in other tax issues (VAT, CIT, DTT) for consistency and compliance with local tax regulations and maintain the relevant documents, files in place upon request of the Tax Authorities.

Responsibilities:
•	Transfer pricing in all aspects: gathered financial information in cooperation with FP&A/Accounting Dep.; maintain and review TP policy, prepare TP documentations such as Local File for group companies,
•	Provide internal tax advisory and support on tax planning and tax compliance in business operation matters, 
•	DAC6 /ATAD – unique experience in the implementation of the new EU Directive on the cross-border level and analysis the relevant events as potential tax reporting schemes,
•	Review, monitor, assess changes and developments of tax law in jurisdictions within the EMEA area including EU tax rules on new tax law developments (ATAD, BEPS, MLI, etc.) 
•	Support and supervision of local and foreign tax audits,
•	Ad-hoc advice regarding local and international tax issues, related accounting questions and/or preparation of legal opinions (DTT, VAT, CIT)
•	Draft or review legal/intercompany agreements, step plans, escalating tax issues to higher management with proposed solutions,
profile_positions.title: International Tax Manager

profile_positions.description:
Role: First point of contact for transfer pricing topics and other tax issues. Support for transfer pricing documentation with gathering information for tax audits and guidelines across companies in CEE Countries.

Responsibilities: 
•	Preparation of transfer pricing documentation for CEE countries,
•	Preparation of financial data for intercompany transactions using the SAP system / ERP Systems, 
•	Preparation of P&L Segmentation,
•	Drafting and review of intercompany agreements,
•	Cooperation with Global Team located in India in order to receive transfer pricing documentation templates meeting local law requirements,
•	Support and supervision of local and foreign tax audits,
•	Proofs gathering for CEE Countries and local CIT perspective.
profile_positions.title: Tax Compliance Specialist  / CEE Finance

profile_positions.description:
Role: Liaise with tax authorities and tax consultants locally. Provide internal tax advisory and support on business operation matters. Coordinate ad-hoc tax-driven business matter. Oversees the group's tax policies and objectives-Identification and evaluation of tax risks.

Responsibilities: 
•	Drafting reports, calculating tax (WHT, CIT) and support in tax declarations for private banking clients,
•	Translation and preparing and documents for tax meetings with The Management Board / CFO,
•	Guidelines for private banking sector in the context of wealthy individual and their tax affairs in order to avoid provision of tax advisory services by the bank to clients,
•	Preparation of legal opinions and drafting intercompany agreements / third party contracts,
•	Drafting motions for binding rulings and legal analysis of case law in order to get tax rulings, win court cases under disputes with Tax Authorities,
•	Issue legal opinions from tax law perspective for retail banking and private banking products.
profile_positions.title: Tax Specialist (Commerzbank Group)

profile_positions.description:
Role: Working closely with managers, support and assist their daily basis job for external clients; Multidisciplinary work relating to taxation and economy, in collaboration with experts from different sectors. Identifying and communicating relevant developments in national & international taxation for clients and ensuring the work is carried out in a timely and qualitative manner.

Responsibilities: 
•	Conducting researches regarding transfer pricing and international tax law,
•	Analyses of tax cases bound up transfer pricing and analyze risk regarding disputes with Tax Administration,
•	Drafting reports, motions, comments, tax alerts, engagement letters, legal opinions,
•	Support in tax audits for external clients,
•	Translation and preparing and documents,
•	Participation in ACCA course for IFRS principles.
profile_positions.title: Tax Assistant (C1) in International transaction services / Transfer Pricing Department

profile_positions.description:
Role: Support and assist the senior members of the Transfer Pricing Team in tax audits and related matters for external clients.

Responsibilities: 
•	Analyses of tax cases bound up transfer pricing and analyze risk regarding disputes with Tax Administration
•	Tax reviews and preparation of transfer pricing documentations,
•	Preparation of benchmarks reports.
profile_positions.title: Tax Assistant (C1) in Transfer Pricing Department

profile_positions.description:
Role: Support and assist the senior members of the Tax Team in tax audits and related matters for external clients

Responsibilities: 
•	Conducting researches regarding Income Tax, Excise, Value Added Tax, Transfer pricing
•	Analyses of tax cases bound up with Tax Law
•	Translation and preparing and documents 
•	Preparation of legal opinions and contracts drafts for Tax Department and Corporate Department for M&A transactions.
profile_positions.title: Intern in Tax Department

profile_positions.description:
Role: Support and assist the senior members of the Income Tax Department

Responsibilities: 
•	Drafting reports concerning information on revision of laws covering the Transfer Pricing 
•	Translation of OECD’s reports and documents, review benchmarks for APAs procedures,
•	Substantive assistance in organizing internal meetings and the delegations
profile_positions.title: Intern in Emergency Planning Department for Advance Transfer Pricing Agreements
